item.title: We have macros
item.description: Welcome to the dark side. We have macros. I’ve been using Emacs ever since my final years at ETH when my mentor convinced me to give it a try. Was that really the late eighties? That can’t be true. Might have been 18.54 even. Then at my first real job I pushed for installation of 19.23 when it came out. I hacked on the ada-mode at the time. From decomplecting.org1:
